Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Dwight Heavy D Myers Way"
Summary: Designates state route 22 between Lorraine Avenue and Lincoln Avenue in the city of Mount Vernon as the "Dwight 'Heavy D' Myers Way".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Dwight 'Heavy D' Myers Way"
